value:
I quite like the uniforms in the Order
of Heroes. They remind me of the
garb worn by Hoshidan kings.

I serve the royal family of Hoshido but
I have not pledged myself to any
single member.$k$pI'm unfit to serve as anyone's
personal retainer. When I was young,
I failed to act, and...

You seem overly busy. Please, tell
me how I may be of service. I will
obey without hesitation.

This army would fall to pieces without
you, so allow me to serve by your side
on the battlefield.$k$pI'll protect your life—even at the cost
of my own.

I have been scouting hiding places
around the castle. As a ninja, I would
prefer to serve from the shadows.

I've come with a greeting from
$Nf for you.

I'm so close. I must work even
harder!

I must use this power to protect
everyone...

It's still not enough. I must train
harder...

Accept my gratitude for this new
strength.

My name is Kaze, a ninja in service of
the Hoshidan royal family. I serve
along with my brother Saizo.$k$pAllow me to assist you as well.

I appreciate you taking the time to talk
with me, but you need not pay me
attention simply because I'm near.$k$pThink of me as a...as a simple stone,
if you will. Always near—$k$pOh? You talk with me because you
want to, not merely out of obligation?
Well, you really are too kind.$k$pIn that case, if you ever desire to chat,
call upon me anytime. I will fulfill such
a request with the utmost devotion.$k$pI'm glad to continue serving under
your command. I will remain as
focused on your protection as ever.
はっ！
せやっ！
うわっ
Well done...
It ends here.
I'll make this quick...
Please forgive me.
I assure you this is not personal.
I have...failed you...
Heehee
I shall stand ready by your side.
Do you have a retainer of your own?
Do not hesitate to call upon me.
For a long time I served no liege. But now...
A lady -- unknown to me -- just gave me something. Can you explain this?
I hope my brother isn't pushing himself too hard. He's far from home...
Let me know if you need a scout. As a ninja, I am trained in stealth.
Yes.
Leave it to me.
Time to move.
